Mail to check the functionality Read More About Me Hi, I’m Vivek Padayattil— a data-driven problem solver with a strong background in data science, AI, and cloud technologies. I enjoy turning raw data into meaningful insights and building intelligent applications that create real business value. With hands-on experience in Python, SQL, machine learning, and MLOps, I specialize in designing and deploying AI solutions on the cloud, particularly using Microsoft Azure. I hold the Azure Data Scientist Associate (DP-100) and preparing for the Azure AI Engineer Associate (AI-102) certifications, which reflect my expertise in developing, deploying, and scaling AI models responsibly. Beyond data science, I am expanding my skills in DevOps and Kubernetes, enabling me to bridge the gap between AI development and reliable production deployment. I enjoy working on end-to-end projects — from data preprocessing and modeling to deployment and monitoring. When I’m not coding, I’m either exploring new technologies, learning about LLM-based applications, or experimenting with side projects that combine AI, software engineering, and automation. I thrive in collaborative environments where I can contribute to impactful projects, continuously learn, and help shape innovative solutions.
